description: Label a 1 cm ruler with digits 1 cm wide.
mathematica: nmax = 105; f[0] = 0; f[n_] := f[n] = f[n-1] + Length[IntegerDigits[f[n-1]]]; digits = Table[IntegerDigits[f[n]], {n, 0, nmax}] // Flatten; a[n_] := digits[[n+1]]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, nmax}] (* _Jean-Fran√ßois Alcover_, Nov 26 2013 *)
author: R. Lozyniak (11(AT)onna.com)
